name: Ernest Ralston
text: Pizza was cool, not hot and not very palatable because of that. I hate cold pizza. The hot wings were fine and I enjoyed them very much. You need to ensure that the pizza is hot whet delivered.

name: Melissa Smith
text: The best looking and best tasting Pizza Hut pizza i have had in my entire life! I haven't eaten pizza hut in years because the quality went completely downhill, but this pizza hut location has changed my mind.

text: Love the beyond meat sausage option! Hoping they get vegan cheese on their menu soon too!
